articles.title: President Biden Tests Positive for the Coronavirus With ‘Mild Symptoms’
articles.body:
• The diagnosis for the 79-year-old president underscored how the virus remained a persistent threat in a country trying to put the pandemic in the past.
  • Mr. Biden is receiving Paxlovid, an anti-viral drug used to minimize the severity of Covid-19, the White House said. Get pandemic news.

heroArticle.title: E.U. Nations Are Asked to Immediately Start Rationing Natural Gas
heroArticle.body:
• Warning of possible further disruptions to Russian fuel exports, the European Union is asking members to adopt a strict energy consumption plan. The plan would solidify the sense that
  • Europe’s economy is on a war footing with Russia, and would need the backing of national governments. Follow updates.

heroSubArticle.title: President Vladimir Putin signaled that Russian gas would resume in a key pipeline but at a reduced level.
In Iran, President Vladimir Putin has found a new ally to help push back against ostracism from the West.
